name: Battlerocktopia
description:
Brief Synopsis

Boss Battle! T-Rock, hero of the land of T-Rocktopia, finds himself battling against a nega-bot. Make use of his pyrotechnic powers and overall badassery as he takes down this bot! Can you defeat this ever-growing boss?


You can check out our website for more cool T-Rocktopia related goodies!www.t-rocktopia.com
